attributes.7: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Drennan is one of Theon's men. When Winterfell was taken, he and another man named Squint rape Palla, the daughter of Farlen. Theon orders them whipped to show the people of Winterfell that he will treat them fairly as their new lord. To ease the escape of Bran, Rickon, Hodor, Summer and Shaggydog, Osha comes to him with a plate of food. He is found slumped over a table, with his pants around his ankles and his throat cut with his own knife.==See also==*AWOIAF==References==reflistGreyjoy navboxCategory:CharactersCategory:Season 2 CharactersCategory:Recurring CharactersCategory:Status: DeadCategory:House GreyjoyCategory:IronbornCategory:Characters from the Iron Islands

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Drennan is one of Theon's men. When Winterfell was taken, he and another man named Squint rape [[Palla]], the daughter of Farlen. Theon orders them whipped to show the people of Winterfell that he will treat them fairly as their new lord. To ease the escape of Bran, Rickon, Hodor, Summer and Shaggydog, Osha comes to him with a plate of food. He is found slumped over a table, with his pants around his ankles and his throat cut with his own knife.
